title: What's the best mid-priced home elliptical machine ($1000-2000)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Take a look at the Schwinn models, they are reasonably priced between $700 and $1100 and have excellent build quality.  If you don't have a very big area for the elliptical make sure you pay attention to the dimensions of the machine before you purchase, some of the Precor models are very big.  Amazon sometimes will offer free shipment on them

ProForm 1110 E Elliptical Trainer is the best choice. I had bought this elliptical and it works great. You can read full reviews about top 5 best elliptical machine here: Best Elliptical Machine Reviews - Top Rated Elliptical Trainer
